# metrics

**Instance Property**

The training metrics of the model for the update task, contained in a dictionary.

## Declaration

```swift
var metrics: [MLMetricKey : Any] { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.coreml/documentation/CoreML/MLMetricKey] to access the values within the dictionary.

## Evaluating the update

- **MLMetricKey**: A key for the metrics dictionary in an update context.
